data.name: Chest Workout
data.description: A chest workout routine for intermediate lifters

exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight exercise for chest muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart.
2. Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
3. Push yourself back up to the starting position.
4. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Keep your core engaged and maintain proper form throughout the exercise.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: A variation of the bench press that targets the upper chest muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Lie on an incline bench with your back flat against it.
2. Hold a barbell or dumbbells above your chest with your arms extended.
3. Lower the weights to your chest.
4. Push the weights back up.
5. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Keep your shoulders back and chest up for proper form.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A classic strength-building exercise for the chest muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Lie on a flat bench with your back on it.
2. Grip a barbell with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
3. Lower the bar to your chest.
4. Push the barbell back up.
5. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Maintain a stable bench and use a spotter when lifting heavy weights.

data.name: Back Workout
data.description: A back workout routine for intermediate lifters

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the lower and upper back muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart, a barbell in front of you.
2. Bend at your hips and knees to lower your body and grip the barbell.
3. Lift the barbell by extending your hips and knees, pulling your shoulders back.
4. Lower the barbell to the ground by reversing the movement.
5. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Maintain a neutral spine and engage your core throughout the exercise.

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and lats.
exercises.instructions:
1. Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you.
2. Pull your body upward until your chin is above the bar.
3. Lower your body back down to the starting position.
4. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Focus on full range of motion and controlled movements.

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.description: A compound exercise for the middle and upper back muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
2. Bend at your hips and knees slightly, keeping your back straight.
3. Pull the barbell toward your lower ribcage, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
4. Lower the barbell back to the starting position.
5. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Keep your core engaged and maintain a strong posture.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: A machine exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles.
exercises.instructions:
1. Sit at a lat pulldown machine with your thighs secured under the pads.
2. Grip the bar with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
3. Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
4. Slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
5. Repeat.
exercises.tips: Maintain proper posture and control the movement throughout.

data.name: Leg Workout
data.description: A routine for building strong legs

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A compound exercise for building leg strength and size
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. 
2. Lower your body as if you were sitting back into a chair. 
3. Keep your weight on your heels and your knees over your toes. 
4. Push yourself back up to the starting position. 
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your chest up to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: A unilateral exercise for building leg strength and balance
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart. 
2. Take a big step forward with one leg. 
3. Lower your body until your front knee is at a 90-degree angle. 
4. Push yourself back up to the starting position. 
5. Repeat with the other leg. 
6. Alternate legs for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Keep your core tight and your front knee over your ankle to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: A compound exercise for building leg and back strength
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart. 
2. Bend down and grab the bar with an overhand grip. 
3. Keep your back straight and your core tight as you lift the bar. 
4. Lower the bar back down to the starting position. 
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift the weight, and keep your shoulders down and back to avoid rounding your back.

exercises.name: Step-ups
exercises.description: An exercise for building leg strength and balance
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand in front of a bench or step. 
2. Step up onto the bench with one foot. 
3. Push through your heel to lift your body up onto the bench. 
4. Step back down with the same foot. 
5. Repeat with the other foot. 
6. Alternate feet for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Keep your core tight and your knee over your ankle to maintain good form.

data.name: Bicep Workout
data.description: A routine for building great biceps

exercises.name: Barbell curls
exercises.description: A classic exercise for building bicep strength and size
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms straight down at your sides. 
2. Curl the barbell up to your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body. 
3. Lower the barbell back down to the starting position. 
4. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your back straight to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Dumbbell curls
exercises.description: An exercise for building bicep strength and size with dumbbells
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms straight down at your sides, holding a dumbbell in each hand. 
2. Curl the dumbbells up to your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body. 
3. Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position. 
4. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your back straight to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Hammer curls
exercises.description: An exercise for building bicep and forearm strength and size
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms straight down at your sides, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing in. 
2. Curl the dumbbells up to your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body. 
3. Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position. 
4. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your back straight to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Preacher curls
exercises.description: An exercise for building bicep strength and size with a preacher bench
exercises.instructions:
1. Sit at a preacher bench with your arms straight down and your armpits resting on the pad. 
2. Curl the barbell up to your chest, keeping your elbows close to the pad. 
3. Lower the barbell back down to the starting position. 
4. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your back straight to maintain good form.

data.name: Tricep Workout
data.description: A routine for building great triceps

exercises.name: Close-grip bench press
exercises.description: A compound exercise for building tricep strength and size
exercises.instructions:
1. Lie on a bench with your feet flat on the floor. 
2. Grip the barbell with your hands close together. 
3. Lower the barbell down to your chest. 
4. Push the barbell back up to the starting position. 
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your elbows close to your body to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Tricep dips
exercises.description: An exercise for building tricep strength and size with your bodyweight
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand facing away from a bench or chair. 
2. Place your hands on the bench or chair behind you. 
3. Lower your body down by bending your elbows. 
4. Push your body back up to the starting position. 
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your shoulders down to maintain good form.

exercises.name: Overhead tricep extension
exercises.description: An exercise for building tricep strength and size with a dumbbell
exercises.instructions:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell with both hands. 
2. Raise the dumbbell above your head. 
3. Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows. 
4. Raise the dumbbell back up to the starting position. 
5. Repeat for the desired number of reps.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your elbows close to your head to maintain good form.
